name: Deep Enigma Demo
description:
Hi everybody!

This is a Demo of my game named Deep Enigma.

It's a Metroidvania game, more looked like to Super Metroid.

This Demo only have a little piece of the first 2 areas.

The project is ready to publish, but it's just a demonstration. The whole game have 10 diferently areas, with about 320 rooms on all the game, with about 330 hidden upgrades itens.

Soon the game will be published. But for now, I have some dificulties with burocracy, and I looking for help to publishing it!

I accept tips and advices on the comments!

Almost all the assets present in this game were purchased by me, from another artists! Almost all the assets aren't public domain! So, please don't use this asset before buying them from the respective artists!

I hope you all enjoy the game!!!
